alert.note: Alert for Baboquivari Mountains including Kitt Peak; Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail; Upper Santa Cruz River and Altar Valleys including Nogales (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 8:22PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Pima County through 930 PM MST... At 822 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Pascua Pueblo Yaqui Reservation, or 10 miles northwest of Sahuarita, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sahuarita, Green Valley, Drexel Heights, Three Points, Pascua Pueblo Yaqui Reservation, Kitt Peak, Valencia West, San Pedro, Santa Rosa Ranch, Fresnal Canyon, Pan Tak, San Xavier Mission and Ryan AirField. This includes the following highways... Interstate 19 between mile markers 52 and 59. Route 86 between mile markers 127 and 161. Route 286 between mile markers 25 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
